GSD.description:
MIPS: fix fortify panic when copying asm exception handlers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 0aeaadc52b05b976c587182d234e3f18e8fce389. For more details please see the references link.
